__e: How did he get security clearance to work here in the first place?
I'd like you to authorize me to see her... on a day other than Visitors Day.
I can't, I don't have the family's authorization.
I'm the guy who's authorized to give you everything you want.
I don't care what you think I've done to you, you are not sanctioned to kill me.
I got permission to time travel for a short time to see this man in her memory dead more than 60 years.
Problem is his crew gets hungry. And they start taking side work, all that's unauthorized by the man.
I got the authorization for you, two weeks ago. But they can't force him.

So, you have to get permission from the government for almost everything, and if that is a definition of a police state, that you can't do anything unless the government gives you permission, we're well on our way...
I can't believe he knew to ask Dad's permission.
That's the thing... I can't get cleared because of my eye.
But, only... after asking your father's permission.
Sorry... ..but I have no authorization for that.
Goddamn it, do we have to do this over every goddamn little thing?
I'm not quite as stupid as you might think, Doc, but I'm sorry, there's just no way I'd ever be able to get this authorized.
